value:
I won't let anyone disturb the peace
at the beach! If I see anyone up to no
good, I'll knock their lights out!

My brother's gonna inherit House
Bergliez, but me? I'm gonna make
a living with my own two hands.

I heard it's gonna rain later, but...
There won't be thunder, right?
N-not like I'm scared or anything!

This heat is perfect for training! I'm
gonna work up a good sweat! Hey,
$Nu, wanna join?

Did I swim too far out? No, I can keep
going! I'll swim until I hit my limit!

I'm Caspar, of the Black Eagles!
I just swam over from
$Nf's place!

My summer is never coming to an
end! I'm gonna keep training and
getting even stronger!

Anyone who gets in my way is gonna
be sorry! I'll hit 'em so hard they'll
forget how to swim!

Damn... Could the heat be getting
to me?

Man, the beach really is awesome!
I never thought I'd see these kinds of
results from my training!

I'm Caspar von Bergliez. Training at
the beach today, huh? Sounds fun!
I'm gonna train to the max! Hiyaaah!

Huh? Oh, it's you... What was
I just doing?$k$pThat's right... I was seeing how far
I could swim, and I went out into the
open sea!$k$pWhat? You found me floating in the
water, unconscious?! ...I guess I must
have pushed myself a little too hard.$k$pBut... When you look out at the open
sea, don't you just think... Is there an
end? How far can I swim?$k$pYou know the feeling, right?
I was hoping you'd say that,
$Nu!$k$pAll right, let's try this again! This time,
I'm going to push myself even harder
and swim as far as I can!
おらあっ
Sink!
ぐあっ
I'll drown...!
Oh, you're going under!
Number one in the sun!
I'll bury you!
Welcome to the beach!
Gotta keep...swimming...
Heh
The beach is so great! The warmth and the water feel so refreshing after a workout!
Huh? Are you offering me a drink? Next time just ask!
It sure is...hot out here... But there's no way I'm letting the heat take me down!
Even at the beach, I can't skip out on training. I should go for a run along the shoreline first thing in the morning!
I caught a HUGE fish when I went diving. Probably the biggest that's ever been caught. We should cook it up!
Swimming sure makes me hungry. Not snack hungry. Hmph. I'm gonna need a full meal!
Are you resting? There's no time to slack! C'mon, let's go for a swim!
On it!
Hot, hot hot hot!
Let's swim!
